name: Effigy
description:
Effigy is a game that lets you perform a digital ritual of burning and release. Drop some images into the /shoebox subfolder and they will appear on pieces of paper in the game. As you burn the pieces of paper, the files will be deleted.

A sequel of sorts to Confessional.

Note: When opening the app for the first time, Mac users have to right-click the app and choose "open" from the menu that appears.
